name: ShutUp
short: Have you ever wanted your bot to just shut up? With this cog you can!
description: Have you ever wanted your bot to just shut up? With this cog you can! It features with two commands: `[p]shutup` and `[p]unshutup` to make your bot stop from sending messages and let it send them again if you so wish!
install_msg: Thanks for installing ShutUp. If you were already crazy enough to add this repo, I can just wish you great fun!
author: Jakub Kuczys (https://github.com/Jackenmen)
